com.brightcove.plugin.onceux

Class PositionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.plugin.onceux.PositionManager

  • public class PositionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Provide a class to manage the media player's playhead position as the frame of reference switches between ads and content within the dynamic stitched video. Diagrammatcially we have: |<(0)------------------------------------ absolute frame of reference --------------------------------------(L)>| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<-- optional ads -->|<-- Segment-0 -->|...|<-- optional ads -->|<---- Segment-i ---->|...|<---- Segment-N ---->| where Segment-i represents the i'th content segment. This class will map a given segment index and relative position to an absolute position (from 0 to L-1, where L is the length of the dynamic stitched video).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PositionManager(EventEmitter eventEmitter)
      Build the position mapper using help from a given event emitter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PositionManager

        public PositionManager(EventEmitter eventEmitter)
        Build the position mapper using help from a given event emitter.
        Parameters:
        eventEmitter - The given event emitter which is used to setup event handler to manage the current (segement) frame of reference and to initialize at the start of a video.
